name: Phoenix Framework
description: Phoenix is a web development framework written in Elixir which implements the server-side Model View Controller (MVC) pattern.

name: Ash Framework
description: A declarative, resource-oriented application development framework for Elixir.

name: Ecto
description: A database wrapper and query generator for Elixir, providing a unified API for working with different databases.

name: Plug
description: A specification and composable modules for web application components, enabling HTTP request handling.

name: Oban
description: A robust job processing library for Elixir, providing background job processing with reliability and concurrency.

name: Exq
description: An Elixir library for job processing, utilizing Redis for managing job queues and worker processes.

name: Nerves
description: A framework for building embedded software using Elixir, providing tools and libraries for hardware interfacing.

name: Dialyzer
description: Dialyzer is a static analysis tool for Erlang and other languages that compile to BEAM bytecode for the Erlang VM

name: ExUnit
description: The built-in testing framework for Elixir, providing a simple and powerful API for writing and running tests.

name: GetText
description: An internationalization and localization library for Elixir, allowing easy translation and formatting of messages.

name: Telemetry
description: A dynamic event dispatching library for Elixir, enabling application monitoring and instrumentation.

name: ExDoc
description: A tool for generating HTML documentation for Elixir projects, transforming documentation into readable web pages.

name: Nx
description: A multi-dimensional tensors library with multi-staged compilation to the CPU/GPU.
